timeline.message:
Support Spring Controllers throwing ResponseStatusException

Fixes: #9055

timeline.bodyText: Does Spring always send text/plain? I would expect it to be clever than that.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
Fair point, but we have been using text/plain for exceptions annotated with @ResponseStatus (which is very similar to this) and we haven't had anyone complain so far.
We can certainly reexamine this on a grander scale if it becomes a problem.
replies.author: geoand
